input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h3: OUR STUDENTS • THEIR FUTURES • OUR FOCUS

div.style: width: 250px; float: right; margin-top: 3px; margin-left: 25px;
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Dear BC Staff and Families:

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Thank you for your understanding, patience, and flexibility with the rapidly evolving situation involving the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19). We are all in this together and it has placed all of us in unchartered waters.
Governor DeWine and the Ohio Department of Health issued an executive order closing all K-12 public schools through the remainder of the school year.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: We will be canceling all activities, including athletics, until further notice during the closure.
The school closure also includes the use of our school buildings by non-school affiliate groups.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: The District will be utilizing online lessons by posting assignments on our website (Grades K-4) and through Schoology (Grades 5-12), the District’s learning management system.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: METHOD OF INSTRUCTIONAL DELIVERY: ONLINE LESSONS

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Grades K-4 (Primary & Intermediate Schools)
Teachers will prepare grade level lessons to be posted on our website (
Grades 5-12 (Middle & High Schools)
Teachers will prepare online lessons using Schoology.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: STUDENT ACCESS TO ONLINE LEARNING PROGRAMS

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Students will use the “Bulldog Portal” located on our website.
Students in grades K-2 will sign in with ADFS
Username is their six digit lunch code. (123456)
Password is “bc” plus their six digit lunch code (bc123456)
Students in grades 3-12 will sign in with ADFS
Username is first.lastname plus last two digits of their graduation year (john.smith25)
Password is “bc” plus their six digit lunch code (bc123456)
Any issues with logins, please call IT at 614-834-6708 or email

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: STUDENTS WITHOUT INTERNET ACCESS

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: District Hotspot Locations

- The District will open a Wi-Fi SSID called “Bulldogs” and students/families may access the network from school grounds 24 hours per day. The best locations include the parking lot area between the middle school and high school football field and in front of the Intermediate School. Lessons may be downloaded and saved to a device.
Hard Copies

– Each building principal will provide hard copies of online lessons by placing packets in marked bins/containers outside the main entrance on an as needed basis. Please contact the school with such a request. This will only be done in emergency circumstances in an effort to reduce the transmission of the virus.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: STUDENTS WITHOUT ACCESS TO A DEVICE

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: (PC, laptop, tablet, iPad, Chromebook, etc.)

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Device Distribution
– The District will loan a chrome devices to students/families in need. Curbside distribution of devices will take place at a date to be communicated and determined later.
Please contact [email protected] or by calling 614-834-6708 to arrange for curbside pick-up in front of BCHS.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: SCHEDULE OF ONLINE LESSONS/ASSIGNMENTS
Lessons are assigned for the following dates:

li.span: March 17th
March 20th - the remainder of the school year.
Please note that lessons will not be assigned for 4/9, 4/10, and 4/13 due to Spring Break
Grade 12/Seniors: May 15, 2020
The target date for the final submission of assignments for seniors will be communicated by teachers.

Grades K-11: May 20, 2020
The target date for the final submission of assignments is Friday, May 22, 2020
Our teachers will continue working through May 29, 2020 to communicate with any student jor parent to finalize grades and bring closure to this school year.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: SUBMITTING & GRADING OF ASSIGNMENTS

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Many lessons and assignments may be completed through various online learning programs allowing for instant submission and grading.
Some lessons, especially in grades K-4, may require submission by scanning or taking pictures of assignments and emailing those to the child's teacher.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: COMMUNICATION PLANS

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Office voicemails will continue to be monitored during any long-term closure. Please allow for 24 hours for a response.
Students in grades 3-12 may email their teachers using school issued Google accounts.
Teachers will monitor voicemail remotely.
Teachers will monitor work email Monday-Friday during their scheduled work day.
The District will utilize all communication resources we have available: phone, email, text, website, and social media.
Families need to make sure their contact information is updated in FinalForms.
For problems accessing FinalForms, please contact the Director of Technology, Mark Thomas at 614-834-6708 or

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: STUDENTS RECEIVING LUNCH ASSISTANCE

ul.style: margin-left: 40px; caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px

li.span: Qualifying students on free & reduced lunch may contact Marilyn Enyart, Director of Food Service, at 614-834-6751 or
to arrange for curbside pick-up.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: The challenges associated with the long-term school closure are abundant and unprecedented for our students, families, and staff. This situation is unfortunate; however, our students, staff, and community are resilient. We will get through this difficult time together. I am humbled and thankful every single day that I get the opportunity to work for the students of the Bloom-Carroll Local School District - even in these unbelievably challenging moments.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: We will provide additional communication as events unfold.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Please contact your child’s school with additional questions.

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Respectfully,

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Shawn Haughn

div.style: caret-color: #403f42; color: #403f42; font-family: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px
div.span: Superintendent

div.style: padding-bottom: 10px
float: right;
div.span:
District Office: 5240 Plum Road, Carroll, Ohio 43112
Phone: 740-756-9700 | Phone: 614-837-6560
Fax: 740-756-4221

div.div: OUR STUDENTS • THEIR FUTURES • OUR FOCUS

div.span:

All Rights Reserved.
